title: Aberrant Series: Aberrant, Moirai, Isaura
description: Featuring the complete ABERRANT series by Ruth Silver. This edition includes Aberrant, Moirai, and Isaura in one book. Bonus content includes an interview with Olivia and a sneak peek of Olivia interviewing Joshua. Full interview is available on the author's website, Write Away Bliss. ABERRANT “If Anthem, The Lottery, The Hunger Games, and Divergent had a child it would most definitely be Aberrant.” – Kira Watson, My Dear Bibliophage MOIRAI “Ruth is masterful at creating characters, and equally masterful at creating suspense that grabs the reader by the throat and holds them hostage!” – Kim Deister, The Caffeinated Diva ISAURA “Isaura will leave your heart pounding, hands shaking, and emotions-racing, as you travel through time and back!” - Alicia Batista, Addicted Readers
author: Ruth  Silver
